Class DefaultGameFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpacman.framework.factory.DefaultGameFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameFactory

    public class DefaultGameFactory
extends Object
implements IGameFactory
    A factory for the classes related to the game, the board, and its content.
    Author:
    Arie van Deursen, TU Delft, Jan 22, 2012
